text: foreign
has always been my favorite holiday what
I love about it I'm just scares that was
me Marshall a year ago and those are my
two best friends Gilbert I have a lunch
this is a bad idea and Amy you sure it
must be a reporter last year was the
craziest Halloween ever we accidentally
woke up in ancient Egyptian mummy we all
thought he was going to be totally mean
and evil turns out he was just a big
sweetheart I nicknamed him Harold
Marshall he became our friend really
awesome friend
but then our pal Buzzy figured out that
Harold only had three days to live she
had to be back in his coffin before
midnight on the third day or he could
turn to death
so we said our goodbyes and got him back
to the museum just in the nick of time
where he could be with the love of his
life for all eternity so how are we
going to top Halloween this year no idea
we'll tag along
I dare you watch under wraps too on
Disney Channel
Halloween has always been my favorite
holiday what I love about it is scared
that was me
